Fishing reports

Every season the rivers produce hundreds of big silver salmon larger than 20 pounds. To be exact â€” Over the last 2 seasons 17.6% of the salmon were 20+ pounders! The rivers will also produce more than 30 serious salmon every season that are greater than 30 pounds, in addition to a couple of serious monsters that are landed in the 40 pound class!
